gui.form.base

Class RadioButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.form.base.FormObject
      • gui.form.base.RadioButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChangeSubject, FunctionTypable, java.lang.Comparable<FormObject>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultRadioButton

    public abstract class RadioButton
extends FormObject
implements FunctionTypable
    RadioButton that can be added to a Form
